verses.verse: וַיַּ֥עַן <S%H6030><s%> answered אִיּ֗וֹב <S%H347><s%> Then Job וַיֹּאמַֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> and said

שָׁמַ֣עְתִּי <S%H8085><s%> I have heard כְאֵ֣לֶּה <S%H428><s%> such רַבּ֑וֹת <S%H7227><s%> many such things מְנַחֲמֵ֖י <S%H5162><s%> comforters עָמָ֣ל <S%H5999><s%> miserable כֻּלְּכֶֽם׃ <S%H3605><s%> all

הֲקֵ֥ץ <S%H7093><s%> is there limit לְדִבְרֵי־ <S%H1697><s%> words ר֑וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> Shall vain א֥וֹ <S%H176><s%> and מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> what יַּ֝מְרִֽיצְךָ֗ <S%H4834><s%> plagues כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for תַעֲנֶֽה׃ <S%H6030><s%> thee that thou answerest

גַּ֤ם ׀ <S%H1571><s%> too אָנֹכִי֮ <S%H595><s%> I כָּכֶ֪ם אֲדַ֫בֵּ֥רָה <S%H1696><s%> I also could speak ל֤וּ־ <S%H3863><s%> as ye [do] if יֵ֪שׁ <S%H3426><s%> were נַפְשְׁכֶ֡ם <S%H5315><s%> your soul תַּ֤חַת <S%H8478><s%> your place נַפְשִׁ֗י <S%H5315><s%> in my soul's אַחְבִּ֣ירָה <S%H2266><s%> stead I could heap up עֲלֵיכֶ֣ם <S%H5921><s%> against בְּמִלִּ֑ים <S%H4405><s%> words וְאָנִ֥יעָה <S%H5128><s%> against you and shake עֲ֝לֵיכֶ֗ם <S%H5921><s%> against בְּמ֣וֹ <S%H1119><s%> at רֹאשִֽׁי׃ <S%H7218><s%> mine head

אֲאַמִּצְכֶ֥ם <S%H553><s%> [But] I would strengthen בְּמוֹ־ <S%H1119><s%> you with פִ֑י <S%H6310><s%> my mouth וְנִ֖יד <S%H5205><s%> and the moving שְׂפָתַ֣י <S%H8193><s%> of my lips יַחְשֹֽׂךְ׃ <S%H2820><s%> should asswage

אִֽם־ <S%H518><s%> If אֲ֭דַבְּרָה <S%H1696><s%> Though I speak לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> is not יֵחָשֵׂ֣ךְ <S%H2820><s%> is not asswaged כְּאֵבִ֑י <S%H3511><s%> my grief וְ֝אַחְדְּלָ֗ה <S%H2308><s%> and [though] I forbear מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> what מִנִּ֥י <S%H4480><s%> at יַהֲלֹֽךְ׃ <S%H1980><s%> what am I eased

אַךְ־ <S%H389><s%> but עַתָּ֥ה <S%H6258><s%> now הֶלְאָ֑נִי <S%H3811><s%> But now he hath made me weary הֲ֝שִׁמּ֗וֹתָ <S%H8074><s%> thou hast made desolate כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all עֲדָתִֽי׃ <S%H5712><s%> all my company

וַֽ֭תִּקְמְטֵנִי <S%H7059><s%> And thou hast filled me with wrinkles לְעֵ֣ד <S%H5707><s%> [which] is a witness הָיָ֑ה <S%H1961><s%> has become וַיָּ֥קָם <S%H6965><s%> rising up בִּ֥י כַ֝חֲשִׁ֗י <S%H3585><s%> [against me] and my leanness בְּפָנַ֥י <S%H6440><s%> to my face יַעֲנֶֽה׃ <S%H6030><s%> in me beareth witness

אַפּ֤וֹ <S%H639><s%> [me] in his wrath טָרַ֨ף ׀ <S%H2963><s%> He teareth וַֽיִּשְׂטְמֵ֗נִי <S%H7852><s%> who hateth חָרַ֣ק <S%H2786><s%> me he gnasheth עָלַ֣י <S%H5921><s%> with בְּשִׁנָּ֑יו <S%H8127><s%> upon me with his teeth צָרִ֓י ׀ <S%H6862><s%> mine enemy יִלְט֖וֹשׁ <S%H3913><s%> sharpeneth עֵינָ֣יו <S%H5869><s%> his eyes לִֽי׃

פָּעֲר֬וּ <S%H6473><s%> They have gaped עָלַ֨י ׀ <S%H5921><s%> against בְּפִיהֶ֗ם <S%H6310><s%> upon me with their mouth בְּ֭חֶרְפָּה <S%H2781><s%> reproachfully הִכּ֣וּ <S%H5221><s%> they have smitten לְחָיָ֑י <S%H3895><s%> me upon the cheek יַ֝֗חַד <S%H3162><s%> themselves together עָלַ֥י <S%H5921><s%> against יִתְמַלָּאֽוּן׃ <S%H4390><s%> they have gathered

יַסְגִּירֵ֣נִי <S%H5462><s%> hath delivered אֵ֭ל <S%H410><s%> God אֶ֣ל <S%H413><s%> to עֲוִ֑יל <S%H5760><s%> me to the ungodly וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> into יְדֵ֖י <S%H3027><s%> into the hands רְשָׁעִ֣ים <S%H7563><s%> of the wicked יִרְטֵֽנִי׃ <S%H3399><s%> and turned me over

שָׁ֘לֵ֤ו <S%H7961><s%> I was at ease הָיִ֨יתִי ׀ <S%H1961><s%> become וַֽיְפַרְפְּרֵ֗נִי <S%H6565><s%> but he hath broken me asunder וְאָחַ֣ז <S%H270><s%> he hath also taken בְּ֭עָרְפִּי <S%H6203><s%> [me] by my neck וַֽיְפַצְפְּצֵ֑נִי <S%H6327><s%> and shaken me to pieces וַיְקִימֵ֥נִי <S%H6965><s%> and set me up ל֝֗וֹ לְמַטָּרָֽה׃ <S%H4307><s%> for his mark

יָ֘סֹ֤בּוּ <S%H5437><s%> compass me round about עָלַ֨י ׀ <S%H5921><s%> and רַבָּ֗יו <S%H7228><s%> His archers יְפַלַּ֣ח <S%H6398><s%> asunder כִּ֭לְיוֹתַי <S%H3629><s%> my reins וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> Without יַחְמ֑וֹל <S%H2550><s%> and doth not spare יִשְׁפֹּ֥ךְ <S%H8210><s%> he poureth out לָ֝אָ֗רֶץ <S%H776><s%> upon the ground מְרֵרָֽתִי׃ <S%H4845><s%> my gall

יִפְרְצֵ֣נִי <S%H6555><s%> He breaketh פֶ֭רֶץ <S%H6556><s%> me with breach עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> up פְּנֵי־ <S%H6440><s%> upon פָ֑רֶץ <S%H6556><s%> breach יָרֻ֖ץ <S%H7323><s%> he runneth עָלַ֣י <S%H5921><s%> and כְּגִבּֽוֹר׃ <S%H1368><s%> upon me like a giant

שַׂ֣ק <S%H8242><s%> sackcloth תָּ֭פַרְתִּי <S%H8609><s%> I have sewed עֲלֵ֣י <S%H5921><s%> over גִלְדִּ֑י <S%H1539><s%> upon my skin וְעֹלַ֖לְתִּי <S%H5953><s%> and defiled בֶעָפָ֣ר <S%H6083><s%> in the dust קַרְנִֽי׃ <S%H7161><s%> my horn

פָּנַ֣י <S%H6440><s%> My face [חֳמַרְמְרָה כ] (חֳ֭מַרְמְרוּ <S%H2560><s%> daub ק) מִנִּי־ <S%H4480><s%> from בֶ֑כִי <S%H1065><s%> with weeping וְעַ֖ל <S%H5921><s%> is on עַפְעַפַּ֣י <S%H6079><s%> and on my eyelids צַלְמָֽוֶת׃ <S%H6757><s%> [is] the shadow of death

עַ֭ל <S%H5921><s%> Although לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> is no חָמָ֣ס <S%H2555><s%> Not for [any] injustice בְּכַפָּ֑י <S%H3709><s%> in mine hands וּֽתְפִלָּתִ֥י <S%H8605><s%> also my prayer זַכָּֽה׃ <S%H2134><s%> [is] pure

אֶ֭רֶץ <S%H776><s%> O earth אַל־ <S%H408><s%> and Let there be no תְּכַסִּ֣י <S%H3680><s%> cover דָמִ֑י <S%H1818><s%> not thou my blood וְֽאַל־ <S%H408><s%> and Let there be no יְהִ֥י <S%H1961><s%> become מָ֝ק֗וֹם <S%H4725><s%> have no place לְזַעֲקָתִֽי׃ <S%H2201><s%> and let my cry

גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> Even עַ֭תָּה <S%H6258><s%> now הִנֵּה־ <S%H2009><s%> behold בַשָּׁמַ֣יִם <S%H8064><s%> [is] in heaven עֵדִ֑י <S%H5707><s%> Also now behold my witness וְ֝שָׂהֲדִ֗י <S%H7717><s%> and my record בַּמְּרוֹמִֽים׃ <S%H4791><s%> [is] on high
מְלִיצַ֥י <S%H3887><s%> scorn רֵעָ֑י <S%H7453><s%> My friends אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to אֱ֝ל֗וֹהַ <S%H433><s%> [tears] unto God דָּלְפָ֥ה <S%H1811><s%> poureth out עֵינִֽי׃ <S%H5869><s%> me [but] mine eye

וְיוֹכַ֣ח <S%H3198><s%> O that one might plead לְגֶ֣בֶר <S%H1397><s%> for a man עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> with אֱל֑וֹהַּ <S%H433><s%> with God וּֽבֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> afflicted אָדָ֥ם <S%H120><s%> as a man לְרֵעֵֽהוּ׃ <S%H7453><s%> his neighbor

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for שְׁנ֣וֹת <S%H8141><s%> years מִסְפָּ֣ר <S%H4557><s%> When a few יֶאֱתָ֑יוּ <S%H857><s%> are come וְאֹ֖רַח <S%H734><s%> the way לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> of no אָשׁ֣וּב <S%H7725><s%> [whence] I shall not return אֶהֱלֹֽךְ׃ <S%H1980><s%> then I shall go
